title: Personal Learning Environment (PLE) Design and Student Agency-Enhancing Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design skills and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Course Strengthening Competency in Designing Learner-Tailored Environments Using Digital Devices for Current Elementary School Teachers

learning_goals: Learners can identify and describe at least three components of a Personal Learning Environment (PLE) suitable for their educational context.
Learners can design and evaluate two types of learning tasks that promote student agency.
Learners can analyze three potential issues in LMS-based PLE operations and propose solutions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
